item.title: Work Experience
item.description:
BVT Construction Ltd

Builder Assistant | Beeton, ON, Canada | December 2023 - Present

  • Assisted skilled tradespeople with material handling, tool operation, and basic construction tasks, including measuring, cutting, and demolition.
  • Assisted with scoping projects with customers to achieve an overall 100% customer satisfaction.
  • Performed preparation and cleanup on the job site, including putting on protective coverings, organizing materials, and maintaining a safe work environment.

John Howard Society of Peel-Halton-Dufferin

Bail Supervisor | Milton, ON, Canada | August 2023 - November 2023

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
Restaurant Page

My most recent project is a simple restaurant page containing a menu of dishes, desserts, and beverages from Bosnia & Herzegovina.

This is the first project I have completed using npm and Webpack. Getting each tab of my restaurant page to render its respective content dynamically was really simple.

What I did was add an event listener to each tab, and when clicked, the innerHTML of the ‘content’ div is set to an empty string.

item.title: About
item.description:
Who am I?

My name is Edis Rahic, an aspiring software developer with a growing portfolio of projects built using modern web technologies such as Next.js, React, and TypeScript. I enjoy solving problems and turning ideas into user-friendly applications.

What was I doing before software development?

Before transitioning into tech, I worked in the criminal justice system, supporting clients through the court system and helping them complete court-ordered sanctions. These experiences strengthened my ability to analyze information, handle sensitive data responsibly, and communicate clearly; skills that carry over into writing clean, maintainable code and collaborating effectively on software projects.
